testcase.name: calculateNewDebtShouldReturnDebtWhenTypeDoesNotExist
testcase.error:
org.mockito.exceptions.misusing.InvalidUseOfMatchersException: Invalid use of argument matchers! 3 matchers expected, 1 recorded: -> at co.com.tarjeta.business.TarjetaBusinessTest.calculateNewDebtShouldReturnDebtWhenTypeDoesNotExist(TarjetaBusinessTest.java:34)
This exception may occur if matchers are combined with raw values: //incorrect: someMethod(anyObject(), "raw String"); When using matchers, all arguments have to be provided by matchers. For example: //correct: someMethod(anyObject(), eq("String by matcher"));
For more info see javadoc for Matchers class.
